name: Ana Mendieta
caption: Untitled (Facial Hair Transplants), 1972
summary: Ana Mendieta (November 18, 1948 â€“ September 8, 1985) was a Cuban American performance artist, sculptor, painter and video artist who is best known for her "earth-body" artwork. Born in Havana, Mendieta arrived in the United States as a refugee in 1961 (two years after Marxist revolutionary leader Fidel Castro overthrew the authoritarian government of Cuban President Fulgencio Batista).
